title: From Contract Lover to the Billionaire's Bride
overview: Chloe is dumped by Mason when he announces his engagement to Sophia, the woman Mason believes will be his ticket to wealth. Mason wants to marry for money, but begs Chloe to be his mistress. When Chloe refuses, Mason frames Chloe's beloved father for Mason's crimes. Ethan is the only lawyer able to help Chloe's dad. Chloe and Ethan build beautiful chemistry as they must find a way to work together if he wants to protect his sister and Chloe wants to save her dad.
